definition[0]: used when you are saying that you believe something is true, although you are not sure
example[0]: Mary is in the garden, I think.
example[1]: I don’t think Ray will mind.
example[2]: ‘Do you understand what I mean?’ ‘Yes, I think so.’
example[3]: ‘Haven’t we met before?’ ‘I don’t think so.’
example[4]: I thought he was honest, but I was wrong.
